skills.name: Crow Summoning
skills.description: Summons crows to attack the enemy and inflict Continuous Damage for 1 turn with a 50% chance.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Toad Poison
skills.description: Covers the enemy with poison, removes 1 beneficial effect, and prevents the target from receiving beneficial effects for 1 turn with a 75% chance.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Beneficial Effects Blocked
skill_effect.description: Buffs cannot be applied to the monster

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Spell of Strengthening
skills.description: Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 20% and increases their Attack Power and Defense for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.
